data.value: This copy has been registered at %s Internet Center.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_ACT__MSG2
data.value: We request you to note this Activation Code and remember it since without this Activation Code you will not be allowed to reactivate the %s in case of reinstallation.

data.value: You need to have License.Key file to proceed further.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_ACT_MSG1
data.value: This copy has been registered at %s Internet Center. Following is the activation code allocated to you. You must mention this code for every communication with %s team.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_ACT_MSG2
data.value: This will help us to provide you better support and fast responses. This is confidential code for your copy and is not inted to be shared with any other %s User

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_ACT_MSG3
data.value: We request you to note this Activation Code and remember it since without this Activation Code you will not be allowed to reactivate the %s in case of reinstallation.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_SUBMIT_MSG1
data.value: Following information will be submitted to %s to register your copy. This information is used to provide technical support and customer services.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_SUBMIT_MSG2
data.value: We respect your privacy, this information will not be shared or disclosed.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_SUBMIT_MSG3
data.value: Please connect to the Internet and press next to submit the information.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_INTERIOR1_MSG1
data.value: Registration process requires Internet connection. If you do not have Internet access on this system, please choose 'No' and press 'Next'.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_INTERIOR1_MSG2
data.value: I have Internet access on this computer

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_INTERIOR1_MSG3
data.value: If you have Internet access through proxy server, then press 'Internet Settings' to configure proxy settings.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_INTERIOR2_FIRST
data.value: Registering this Product Key for the first time.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_INTRO_MSG1
data.value: This wizard will guide you through the complete Registration process. Once %s is registered, it will be activated and you will be able to update your copy.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_INTRO_MSG2
data.value: Activation would enable you to get free online services and other benefits for which a registered user is entitled.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_INTRO_MSG3
data.value: This will help us to inform you about the latest developments regarding %s, newly discovered security threats and other information that is important for you and your business.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_OFFLINE_WEBMSG
data.value: You will need to register your copy by filling the registration form on our website. You can visit our site with any PC having Internet connection.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_OFFLINE_PHONE_MSG1
data.value: You will need to call our office and get a registration code.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_OFFLINE_PHONE_MSG2
data.value: Please select the mode you wish to follow and press NEXT

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_PHONE_MSG1

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_PHONE_MSG3

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_MY_MSG1

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_MY_WEB

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_DLG_MY_MSG3

data.name: IDS_USBPRCTN_HEADING
data.value: Manage autorun functionality of the PC and removable drives

data.name: IDS_USBPRCTN_PC_STATUS_DISABLE
data.value: Currently your PC is not protected against malwares that use autorun feature.

data.name: IDS_USBPRCTN_PC_STATUS_DISABLE_DESC
data.value: Clicking the above button will protect your PC against autorun malwares. This will prevent automatic execution of malwares and other applications on your PC when removable devices (like USB, Pen Drives, CD/DVD etc.) are plugged-in.

data.name: IDS_USBPRCTN_PC_STATUS_ENABLE
data.value: Your PC is secure against malwares that use autorun feature.

data.name: IDS_USBPRCTN_PC_STATUS_ENABLE_DESC
data.value: Clicking the above button will unprotect your PC against autorun malwares. This will allow automatic execution of malwares and other applications on your PC when removable devices (like USB, Pen Drives, CD/DVD etc.) are plugged-in.

data.name: IDS_STR_INSTALLER_CABLEMON
data.value:
As a part of Network Protection driver installation you may get prompts saying The software you are installing for this hardware has not passed Windows logo testing.
Driver signing is under process and will be done by next version. Please select Continue Anyway to continue with installation. The driver has been tested thoroughly and there are no compatibility issues on any Windows platforms.

data.value: Some viruses were found active in memory.

data.name: IDS_STR_INSTALLER_INVALID_PATH

data.name: IDS_STR_INSTALLER_NORENAMEFILE

data.name: IDS_STR_INSTALLER_FOLDER_INFO
data.value: To continue installing in this folder, click Next. To change the installation folder either click Browse and select the new folder or directly type the new path in the editbox below. To quit installation at this stage, click Cancel.

installation icon in the %s program group to install.

data.name: IDS_STR_INSTALLER_OAV_FOUND_MSG
data.value:
Setup has detected %s installed on this system. %s is not compatible with this program. It is recommed to uninstall this product. Click Uninstall to uninstall %s.
To keep %s and proceed with installation click Continue.

data.name: IDS_STR_INSTALLER_OAV_CONT_MSG
data.value: The following programs of %s are incompatible with %s. Loading following programs along with %s may create issues like freezing the system. It is recommed to disable following programs of %s to avoid the incompatibility issues.

data.name: IDS_STR_INSTALLER_OAV_QHFOUND_MSG
data.value:
Setup has detected older version of %s installed on this system. To uninstall the older version of %s Click Uninstall.
To keep the older version and quit the setup Click Exit Setup.

data.name: IDS_STR_NATIVESET_UNABLETOSCHEDULEMSG
data.value: Unable to schedule Native Boot Scan to execute for next boot. Native Boot Scanner files may be corrupt or damaged. Please use the Emergency Bootable CD to clean the system.

data.name: IDS_RENEWAL_RNKEY_ALREADY_EXITS

Cannot proceed with the provided Renewal Key.
The Renewal Key is already registered. Renewal Key can be used only once.

data.name: IDS_STR_INSTALLER_FIREWALL_NOTSPP
data.value: Quick Heal Firewall Pro can not be installed on this operating system.

data.name: IDS_LIVEUPDATE_ADMIN_ROAMPERIODOVER
data.value:
You have not connected to your Corporate Network since last 2 months. To get further definition updates for %s you need to connect to your Corporate Network.
Note: Corporate Network is the network where %s Admin Console is installed. For more information, contact your System Administrator.

data.name: IDS_REMIND_ABOUTTOEXPIRE
data.value: Your %s upgrade subscription is about to expire in %d day(s).

data.name: IDS_REMIND_EXPIRINGTODAY

data.value: Configured to block all attachments. Attachment(s) deleted are:

data.name: IDS_LIVEUPDATE_SDNASCAN_INFORMATION
data.value: There are new suspicious file entries in your Quarantine folder, that are yet to be submitted to research lab. Suspicious file submission ensures the detailed analysis of the file in research lab of Quick Heal. After the detailed analysis it can be added in the known virus signature database which will be provided in updates to all the users.

data.name: IDS_STR_INSTALLER_AGREEMSG

data.name: IDS_LIVEUPDATE_RESTRICTED_SERVICESTART

data.name: IDS_LIVEUPDATE_COPY_BLOCKED

data.name: IDS_ANTIPHIS_PHISHFILTER_MSG
data.value:
%s AntiPhishing has detected that Internet Explorer's AntiPhishing is enabled. Running two or more AntiPhishing could affect your browsing experience in the following ways:
1. Inconsistent result may be seen. 2. Browsing speed may slow down.

data.name: IDS_ANTIPHIS_PHISHFILTER_DISABLE
data.value: Disable Internet Explorer's AntiPhishing, enable %s AntiPhishing.

data.name: IDS_ANTIPHIS_ENABLE_TOOLTIP_MSG
data.value: %s AntiPhishing status will be displayed when you browse next.

data.name: IDS_ANTIPHIS_DISABLE_TOOLTIP_MSG
data.value: To view the blocked Phishing site, Click on 'I want to visit this page anyway' on this page or Restart your browser.

data.name: IDS_STR_NTCANL
data.value: Please check if %s is properly installed. Uninstall and reinstall it again.

data.name: IDS_LIVEUPDATE_DEF_ERROR
data.value:
The update definition file is corrupt.
Aborting Update Process.

data.name: IDS_LIVEUPDATE_ADMIN_ROAMPERIODOVER1
data.value:
You have not connected to your Corporate Network since last 2 months. To get further definition updates for %s you need to connect to your Corporate Network.
Note: Corporate Network is the network where %s Admin Console is installed. For more information, contact your System Administrator.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_MSG_CONFIRM_EMAIL
data.value: Confirm Email Address should be same as Email Address.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_SUB_MULTIUSER_PACK_DETAIL
data.value: Accept the Multi User Pack activation details.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_SUB_MULTIUSER_MSG
data.value: The provided Product Key belongs to a Multi User Pack that is already registered. Below are the registration details of the Multi User Pack which will be applicable to the provided Product Key. To continue with activation click Next, to quit the activation click Cancel.

data.name: IDS_ACTIVATION_SUB_REACT_MSG
data.value: The provided Product Key is already registered with following details. To activate your copy click Next. To quit the activation process click Cancel.

data.name: IDS_LIVEUPDATE_EMAILID_REQUIRED
data.value: To submit quarantined file, provide your email address below and click OK.

data.name: IDS_LIVEUPDATE_REBOOTPROMPT_REBOOTMSG
data.value: Quick Update has downloaded a critical update which requires the system to restart. Quick update will not download further updates until the next restart hence your system may be exposed to new threats.

data.name: IDS_LIVEUPDATE_REBOOTPROMPT_UPDIMP
data.value: If you wish to restart your system now, please save all your work and reboot your system. Incase if you wish to restart later, select the desired time so that Quick Update will remind you again about the restart.
